list.expr: (max (ALERTS_FOR_STATE{system=~"$system",service=~"$service",jmxrole=~"$jmxrole",instance=~"$instance", alert_group="jmx", alertname=~ "$alertname", severity=~"$severity"})  by (system,service,jmxrole,instance,alert_group,alertname,summary)  / max(ALERTS{system=~"$system",service=~"$service",jmxrole=~"$jmxrole",instance=~"$instance", alert_group="jmx", alertname=~ "$alertname", alertstate="firing",severity=~"$severity"})  by (system,service,jmxrole,instance,alert_group,alertname,summary) ) * 1000
list.name: alerts jmx

list.expr: (max (ALERTS_FOR_STATE{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", alert_group="os", alertname=~ "$alertname", severity=~"$severity"})  by (system,instance,alert_group,alertname,summary)  / max(ALERTS{system=~"$system", instance=~"$instance", alert_group="os", alertname=~ "$alertname", alertstate="firing",severity=~"$severity"})  by (system,instance,alert_group,alertname,summary) ) * 1000
list.name: alerts os

targets.legendFormat: {{ service }} {{ jmxrole }} {{ name }} memeory pool used
